        messageType - the message type
        position - the position on the screen where the info window should be displayed
        icon - the custom message icon

      • showInfo

        public static void showInfo(java.lang.String message,
            int messageType,
            int position,
            javax.swing.ImageIcon icon,
            long displayDuration)
        method to show the JSlidingInfo with the message, message type, window position, icon and display duration
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be displayed
        messageType - the message type
        position - the position on the screen where the info window should be displayed
        icon - the custom message icon
        displayDuration - the display duration in milliseconds

      • showInfo

        public static void showInfo(java.lang.String message,
            int messageType,
            int position,
            javax.swing.ImageIcon icon,
            long displayDuration,
            java.awt.Color messageColor,
            java.awt.Color backgroundColor)
        method to show the JSlidingInfo with the message, message type, window position, icon, display duration, message text color and background color
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be displayed
        messageType - the message type
        position - the position on the screen where the info window should be displayed
        icon - the custom message icon
        displayDuration - the display duration in milliseconds
        messageColor - the message foreground color
        backgroundColor - the message background color

      • showInfo

        public static void showInfo(java.lang.String message,
            int messageType,
            int position,
            javax.swing.ImageIcon icon,
            long displayDuration,
            java.awt.Color messageColor,
            java.awt.Color backgroundColor,
            java.awt.Font messageFont)
        method to show the JSlidingInfo with the message, message type, window position, icon, display duration, message text color, background color and message font
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be displayed
        messageType - the message type
        position - the position on the screen where the info window should be displayed
        icon - the custom message icon
        displayDuration - the display duration in milliseconds
        messageColor - the message foreground color
        backgroundColor - the message background color
        messageFont - the message font

      • showInfo

        public static void showInfo(java.lang.String message,
            int messageType,
            int position,
            javax.swing.ImageIcon icon,
            long displayDuration,
            java.awt.Color messageColor,
            java.awt.Color backgroundColor,
            java.awt.Font messageFont,
            long slideSpeedDelay)
        method to show the JSlidingInfo with the message, message type, window position, icon, display duration, message text color, background color, message font and slide speed delay
        Parameters:
        message - the message to be displayed
        messageType - the message type
        position - the position on the screen where the info window should be displayed
        icon - the custom message icon
        displayDuration - the display duration in milliseconds
        messageColor - the message foreground color
        backgroundColor - the message background color
        messageFont - the message font
        slideSpeedDelay - the sliding window slide speed delay in milliseconds. lower the value, higher the slide speed
